channel.title: Pong on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Pong on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Retail’s Tech Champion
item.description: Today in Tedium: For a wide variety of reasons, Sears has been a company creaking its way through modern times for longer than many of the people reading this have even been alive. It was a fundamental company to the American revolution—while it didn’t invent the mail-order catalog, it made it a successful business and set the stage for decades of followers. But I don’t want to wallow in Sears’ failings; there are plenty of other outlets for that.
